The greatest judges among the psychopomps are yamarajes, whose wisdom is legendary and whose edicts are unappealable except to ushers or [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=290) herself. A yamaraj resembles an immense dragon with dark, feathery scales and an emotionless, dispassionate gaze behind a feathered mask. When not serving as the senior magistrates, lords, and generals of the [Boneyard](/Planes.aspx?ID=39), yamarajes pursue highly individualistic hobbies, such as gardening or literature. **[Recall Knowledge - Monitor](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 42 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 37 [Yamaraj](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3150) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 277 1.1 **Perception** +37; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=67) 240 feet, [_truesight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) **Languages** [Chthonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=114), [Diabolic](/Languages.aspx?ID=117), [Empyrean](/Languages.aspx?ID=115), [Requian](/Languages.aspx?ID=34); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=79) 120 feet, [_truespeech_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1728) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +33, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +38, [Boneyard Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +40, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +34, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +34, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +36, [Legal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +40, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +38, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +38, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +38 **Str** +10 **Dex** +7 **Con** +7 **Int** +10 **Wis** +7 **Cha** +6 --- **AC** 45 **Fort** +33 **Ref** +31 **Will** +35 +1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=644) **HP** 375 ([fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=62) 20, lightning drinker) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=586) (see lightning drinker) **Resistances** [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669) 20, [void](/Traits.aspx?ID=510) 20 **[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=64)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=590), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=598), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647)) 60 feet, DC 39
**Lightning Drinker** Whenever a yamaraj would take electricity damage if not for its immunity, its fast healing increases to 40 on its next turn. During that turn, if it uses Beetle Breath, the beetles deal 2d12 additional electricity damage. --- **Speed** 35 feet, fly 50 feet, swim 30 feet **Melee** jaws +38 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d8+18 piercing plus Improved [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45) and yamaraj venom and 3d6 shepherd's touch **Melee** claw +38 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d4+18 slashing plus 3d6 shepherd's touch **Melee** tail +38 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d10+18 bludgeoning plus 3d6 shepherd's touch **Divine Innate Spells** DC 44 - **5th** [Translocate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1724) (at will), [Mind Probe](/Spells.aspx?ID=193) (at will) - **8th** [Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33) (×3), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (×3), [Wall of Force](/Spells.aspx?ID=363) - **9th** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Seize Soul](/Spells.aspx?ID=1664), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301), [Wails of the Damned](/Spells.aspx?ID=1747) - **10th** [Manifestation](/Spells.aspx?ID=1592) (see final judgment), [Revival](/Spells.aspx?ID=262) - **Constant (10th)** [Truesight](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) **Rituals** DC 44 - **5th** [Call Spirit](/Rituals.aspx?ID=5), [Resurrect](/Rituals.aspx?ID=20) **Beetle Breath** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) The yamaraj breathes a blast of beetles in a 50-foot cone that deals 14d8 slashing damage and 4d8 [persistent slashing damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) to creatures in the area with a DC 42 Reflex save. It can't use Beetle Breath again for 1d4 rounds.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature takes half damage and is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=91).
**Failure** The creature takes full damage and is sickened 2.
**Critical Failure** The creature takes double damage and is sickened 3. **Final Judgment** A yamaraj's [_manifestation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1592) spells are used only to pronounce judgment, typically either to restore a dead or destroyed creature to life, bind a creature to the [Boneyard](/Planes.aspx?ID=39), or banish a creature from the Boneyard. **Shepherd's Touch** A yamaraj's Strikes have the benefit of a [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2840) property rune and deal an additional 3d6 void damage to living creatures or 3d6 vitality damage to undead. **Yamaraj Venom** ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) While a creature is [clumsy](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61) from this poison, it is [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=67) with the same value; **Saving Throw** DC 42 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 10 rounds; **Stage 1** 3d8 poison damage and [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61) (1 round); **Stage 2** 5d8 poison damage and clumsy 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** 7d8 poison damage and clumsy 3 (1 round).
